reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Great at explaining complex concepts, but her exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Very engaging lectures and always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Interesting lectures but sometimes hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: He knows his stuff but expects students to be self-driven.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject, makes learning fun and interactive.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: A bit dry at times, but knowledgeable and fair in grading.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Clear and concise teaching, but the material is challenging.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and open to diverse viewpoints.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Really cares about students, though her grading is strict.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Lectures can be monotonous, and the assignments are tedious.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Brilliant and thought-provoking. Makes you think deeply about life.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Content is interesting, but the exams are very difficult.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Encourages creativity and critical thinking, but readings are heavy.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Explains well, but you need to put in extra effort to succeed.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about the environment and makes the subject come alive.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable but sometimes gets sidetracked in lectures.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Really knows her field, but expects a lot from students.

reviews.subject: Geography
reviews.review: Not very engaging, and the material can be dry.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Inspires deep thinking and is very approachable.

reviews.subject: Computer Engineering
reviews.review: Good balance of theory and practical work, but assignments are tough.
